TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Image extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: Displays an image on a Web page.

span.span: Displays an image on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控制可让您使用服务器代码中的映像。The control lets you work with images from server code. 使用控件来显示在网页上请求的浏览器支持的任何有效的图像。Use the control to display any valid image supported by the requesting browser on the Web page. 通过将设置指定所显示的图像的路径属性。The path to the displayed image is specified by setting the property. 你可以指定要映像不可用时通过设置代替映像显示的文本属性。You can specify the text to display in place of image when the image is not available by setting the property. 通过将设置指定相对于在网页上其他元素的图像对齐方式属性。The alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page is specified by setting property. > [!NOTE] > 此控件仅显示图像。This control only displays an image. 如果你需要捕获鼠标单击在图像上的，使用控件。If you need to capture mouse clicks on the image, use the control. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建在网页上的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create an control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例类。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_image_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_image_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_image_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_image_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

Public Overridable Property AlternateText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

summary.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip.

span.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip.

value.span: 中显示的备用文本控制图像时不可用。

span.span: The alternate text displayed in the control when the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定要显示如果在指定的图像的文本属性不可用。Use this property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the property is not available. 在浏览器支持的工具提示功能，此文本还显示为工具提示。In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also displays as a ToolTip. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定映像不可用时显示的图像的替换文字。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display for the image when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DescriptionUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string DescriptionUrl
Public Overridable Property DescriptionUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DescriptionUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the location to a detailed description for the image.

span.span: Gets or sets the location to a detailed description for the image.

value.span: 包含有关映像的详细的说明文件的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the file that contains a detailed description for the image.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的 HTML 文件，为映像提供其他详细信息。The property specifies an HTML file that provides additional details for the image. 属性呈现为`longdesc`图像控件的属性。The property renders as the `longdesc` attribute for the image control. 如果属性未设置，或设置为一个空字符串 ("")，则控件呈现而无需`longdesc`属性。If the property is not set, or is set to an empty string (""), the control renders without the `longdesc` attribute. 使用属性来补充属性。Use the property to supplement the property. 例如，如果你使用控件显示的太阳系映像，你可以设置属性`The Solar System,`然后设置属性进一步描述的星球中的 sun 图像的 HTML 页太阳系。For example, if you use an control to display an image of the solar system, you can set the property to `The Solar System,` and then set the property to an HTML page that further describes the image of planets orbiting the sun in the solar system. 属性是可选的但它可以增强你的网页上的纯文本的浏览器的可访问性，屏幕阅读器。The property is optional, but it can enhance the accessibility of your Web page for text-only browsers and screen readers. 浏览器可以使用详细的文本说明来传达重要概念代替了，或者除，视觉对象的图像。Browsers can use the detailed text description to convey important concepts in place of, or in addition to, the visual image. 浏览器文档来了解关于如何使用由指定的描述性内容的详细信息，请参阅`longdesc`属性。Refer to your browser documentation for details on how it uses the descriptive content specified by the `longdesc` attribute.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate text attribute for an empty string value.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate text attribute for an empty string value.

value.span: 如果该控件生成空字符串值; 的替换文字特性否则为。

span.span: if the control generates the alternate text attribute for an empty string value; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当未设置属性，控件不包括`alt`特性以指定在控件呈现的替换文字。By default, when the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate text in the control rendering. 设置属性`true`以始终在呈现的输出中包含的替换文字特性控件。Set the property to `true` to always include the alternate text attribute in rendered output for the control. XHTML 文档类型定义需要`alt`图像控件上的属性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 但是，辅助功能最佳做法建议不传达网页上的上下文相关的信息的图像控件不应指定`alt`属性。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 您可以通过设置满足 XHTML 和可访问性要求属性`true`。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign ImageAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign ImageAlign
Public Overridable Property ImageAlign As ImageAlign
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageAlign ImageAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageAlign value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定相对于在网页上其他元素的图像对齐方式。Use the property to specify or determine the alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page. 下表列出可能的对齐方式。The following table lists the possible alignments. |对齐方式Alignment|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置的对齐方式。The alignment is not set.| |`Left`|映像与文本换行右侧对齐网页的左边缘。The image is aligned on the left edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the right.| |`Right`|映像与文本换行左侧对齐 Web 页的右边缘上。The image is aligned on the right edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the left.| |`Baseline`|图像的下边缘与文本的第一行的下边缘对齐。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Top`|图像的上边缘与在同一行上的最大元素的上边缘对齐。The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest element on the same line.| |`Middle`|图像的中间与文本的第一行的下边缘对齐。The middle of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Bottom`|图像的下边缘与文本的第一行的下边缘对齐。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`AbsBottom`|图像的下边缘与在同一行的最大元素的下边缘对齐。The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the largest element on the same line.| |`AbsMiddle`|在同一行的最大元素居中对齐是图像的中间。The middle of the image is aligned with the middle of the largest element on the same line.| |`TextTop`|图像的上边缘与同一行上的最高文本的上边缘对齐。The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest text on the same line.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的对齐方式相对于其他元素在网页上的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ImageUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string ImageUrl
Public Overridable Property ImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

value.span: 提供的路径中显示的图像的 URL控件。

span.span: The URL that provides the path to an image to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在中显示图像的 URL控件。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the control. 你可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相对 URL 相关到 Web 页的位置的映像的位置，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对 Web 页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地移动整个站点到另一个目录服务器上而无需更新的代码。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code. 绝对 URL 提供的完整路径，因此将站点移动到另一个目录时需要更新代码。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在中显示的图像的位置控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Image.AlternateText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Image.AlternateText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Renders the image control contents to the specified writer.

span.span: Renders the image control contents to the specified writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 控件实现方法跳过的任何子控件的呈现。The control implements the method to skip rendering of any child controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便之后会始终显示某些文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that some text is always displayed after the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/CS/custom_image_rendercontentscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageRenderContents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/VB/custom_image_rendercontentsvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/CS/custom_image_rendercontents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageRenderContents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageRenderContents/VB/custom_image_rendercontents.vb#2)]

.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .
